name: Air Raid Over Britain
detailed_description: Air Raid Over Britain is a short VR experience / technical demo that places you in the heart of a small English town during a nighttime bombing raid by German HE-111s. In this fully VR experience, you'll hear and see the sights, sounds, and feelings of WWII as experienced from a ground-level perspective. Using era-specific details and sounds, you'll gain an unique perspective on the terrors of war, particularly during "The Blitz" between 1940-1941.
about_the_game: Air Raid Over Britain is a short VR experience / technical demo that places you in the heart of a small English town during a nighttime bombing raid by German HE-111s. In this fully VR experience, you'll hear and see the sights, sounds, and feelings of WWII as experienced from a ground-level perspective. Using era-specific details and sounds, you'll gain an unique perspective on the terrors of war, particularly during "The Blitz" between 1940-1941.
short_description: Air Raid Over Britain (technical demo) places you in the heart of a small English town during a nighttime bombing raid by German HE-111s.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 7, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon™ RX 480 equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
